descriptions:
["DescriptionAx Capital is delighted to bring you this stunning 3 bedroom + Maids in Burj Khalifa, the tallest residential tower in the world. 
* Private Parking
* Wooden Flooring
* Panoramic views of DIFC and the water
* No pillars in living room
* Maids Room
* High-Quality Finishings
* Well Maintained unit
The property has a generous living space of 2,323 sq ft with a splendid view of the sea and DIFC. This is a great deal to grab for those looking to rent or buy this unit. Ideal for residents and visitors alike, this property has contemporary styling throughout its spacious living area and the bedroom. There is ample storage, laundry room, guest washroom and walk-in wardrobes in the bedroom. The modern kitchen is fully equipped with high-quality appliances. 
Burj Khalifa's height is well-known around the world but there are so many unknown facts about the building. There is a noticeable temperature difference from the base to the top of the tower, it is believed to be 6°C. It is twice the height of the Empire State Building in the United States of America and three times the height of the Eiffel Tower in Paris. If you were to layout each individual piece of the Burj Khalifa from end to end you would cover more than a quarter of the earth's surface. The cost of the Burj Khalifa is USD $1.5 billion, the entire investment was paid off within the first year of inauguration."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionIt is viewed as an ideal island lifestyle choice for families and business people,offering residential apartments for rent and apartments for sale.It is a family-friendly community comprising apartments.Step outside and enjoy the fresh breeze,while catching up with friends at a nearby cafe or enjoy one of the surrounding different retail outlets.Al Reem Island defines clean and healthy living against a backdrop of opulence and luxury.
Hydra Avenue is located in the City of Lights district of Al Reem Island.Walking distance to the Mall with it's vibrant mix of shops and services.It is exclusively a luxury residential tower for those who like to have both lavishness and convenience at the tip of their fingers.And the state of art makes City of Lights development a more popular residential area.
Nearby Amenities:The Reem Mall, Waitrose Supermarket, Saadiyat Island
For more information 
Call : +971504544160
Email : info@townpropuae.com
Town Properties is experienced,motivated and work diligently to ensure your property needs are met."]

descriptions:
['Description- Excellent Type 15 villa
- Owner occupied
- 5 en-suite double bedrooms
- Family room and maids quarters
- Large living room & d/kitchen, 7,500 sq. ft plot
- Short walk to the park/pool
- Amazing golf course view
- Please call Jack on +971502218464
Entrance/hall, cloakroom, en-suite double bedroom, light living/dining room with numerous windows and sliding doors to the garden, kitchen/breakfast room family room off.
On the first floor you will find another family room, master bedroom with en-suite bath/shower and dressing area. There are three other double bedrooms upstairs, one having an en-suite facility and the remaining two having the ‘Jack & Jill’ option.
Externally, the garden oozes relaxation giving a fantastic view of the Arabian Ranches golf course.
Call Jack (BRN: 28117) on +971502218464 for more information, to arrange a viewing or to make an offer.
Finance is available on this property through haus & haus partners. Please speak to us for more information.
For further details or to arrange viewings, please contact our Head Office on +97143025800, alternatively visit our website www.hausandhaus.com where you will find our full selection of properties available both for sale and rent.']
